Recommendations.Title: Sports and physical activity – Runnymede Borough Council
Key Strengths: Mentions sports, physical activities, and government funded Holiday and Food (HAF) programme for children who receive free school meals.
Relevant for promoting physical activity and nutrition among children in need.
Recommendations.Reasoning: The information provided indicates a program aimed at providing sports, physical activities, and food assistance for children eligible for free school meals during holidays. This is highly relevant for council customer information needs as it focuses on supporting families with low income.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: All items in the provided list were analyzed for relevance and quality based on their title, link, snippet, and key strengths. Ten items were examined, of which five best meet the stated criteria and confidence threshold (60%).
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The chosen recommendations provide information about support programs that cater to the needs of families with low income, including sports, physical activities, holiday food projects, financial assistance funds, and household support fund policies. Recommendations are ordered by relevance and quality, as well as the potential impact on council customer information needs.
